snippet: Willie Wilson, the African-American businessman, will endorse Jesús G. Garcia, who is known as Chuy, over Rahm Emanuel in the runoff on April 7, Mr. Wilson said Wednesday.
abstract: African-American businessman Willie Wilson, who won more than 10 percent of vote in Chicago's February mayoral race, says he will endorse candidate Jesus G Garcia in runoff on April 7.
lead_paragraph: Willie Wilson, the African-American businessman, will endorse Jesús G. Garcia, who is known as Chuy, over Rahm Emanuel in the runoff on April 7, Mr. Wilson said Wednesday.

headline.main: Illinois: Jesús Garcia Gains Backing of Key Black Figure in Chicago Race
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Jesús Garcia Gains Backing of Key Black Figure in Chicago Race
